meta.name: description
meta.content: Blue River Valley schools provide a core curriculum with a reinvigorated focus on authentic literacy, reading, and writing. We are developing a strong data-driven and aligned curriculum, emphasizing differentiated instruction, providing AP classes for our high school students and participating as a partner in the New Castle Career Center.
